definitions.definition: A poetic form with regular meter and a fixed rhyme scheme.
examples: Restoration literature is well known for its carefully constructed verse .
The restrictions of verse have steadily been relaxed over time.

definitions.definition: One of several similar units of a song, consisting of several lines, generally rhymed.
examples: Note the shift in tone between the first verse and the second.

definitions.definition: A small section of a holy book ( Bible , Quran etc.)
A portion of an anthem to be performed by a single voice to each part .

main_definition: A poetic form with regular meter and a fixed rhyme scheme.
secondary_definitions: One of several similar units of a song, consisting of several lines, generally rhymed.
A small section of a holy book ( Bible , Quran etc.)
( music ) A portion of an anthem to be performed by a single voice to each part .
